Class TaskList

  • java.lang.Object
    • TaskList
  • public class TaskList
extends java.lang.Object
    stores the tasks of user input

      private int currentTC  
      private java.util.ArrayList<Task> storeList  

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      TaskList()
      contains the task list e.g., it has operations to add/delete tasks in the list

      add class store user input into TaskList when they key in a tasks to do based on these parameters:
      (package private) void delete​(int index)
      used to delete the tasks in the list and on file
      (package private) void done​(int index)
      if user input is "done", will get the index and mark the status of that index in the list and file as done
      (package private) void find​(java.lang.String word)
      if user input is "find", will find the tasks that match user input
      (package private) void getlist()
      when user keys in "list" as input, will print out entire list in storeList

    • Constructor Detail

      • TaskList

        public TaskList()
        contains the task list e.g., it has operations to add/delete tasks in the list

      • TaskList

        public TaskList​(java.util.ArrayList<Task> storeList)
        Parameters:
        storeList - is the ArrayList used to store what kind of tasks, its description and date of TaskList

    • Method Detail

      • getTC

        int getTC()
        gets current tasks count on list
        Returns:
        the total number of incomplete tasks in the list

      • getTasks

        java.lang.String getTasks()
        Get the last tasks in storeList
        Returns:
        the string format used for output purpose of adding and deleting list e.g. [T] [YES] write book

      • add

        void add​(java.lang.String code,
         java.lang.String desc,
         java.lang.String date)
        add class store user input into TaskList when they key in a tasks to do based on these parameters:
        Parameters:
        code - is either todo, deadline or event
        desc - describes the type of tasks / event that user has
        date - is used for deadline and event. The specified format for deadline is deadline [task desc] /by dd/mm/yyyy 0000 (0000 is time in 24-hour format) The specified format for deadline is event [task desc] /at dd/mm/yyyy 0000 (0000 is time in 24-hour format)

      • getlist

        void getlist()
        when user keys in "list" as input, will print out entire list in storeList

      • done

        void done​(int index)
        if user input is "done", will get the index and mark the status of that index in the list and file as done
        Parameters:
        index - is the position of the tasks in the list

      • find

        void find​(java.lang.String word)
        if user input is "find", will find the tasks that match user input
        Parameters:
        word - is the description of tasks that user would like to find

      • delete

        void delete​(int index)
        used to delete the tasks in the list and on file
        Parameters:
        index - identifies the position of the tasks in the list
